title: Of Story and Spirit
description:
A YA horror-fantasy retelling of Frances Hodgson Burnett's timeless classic A LITTLE PRINCESS!!!
There once was a girl who could weave stories into realities...Sara Cruz's father has just been murdered by one of the very stories she has brought to life. After her father's death, she is sent to Miss Minchin's School for Gifted Girls to live out the rest of her teenage years and learn to harness her magical ability before it can hurt anyone else. But once Sara steps into the ivy-covered manor, Sara can tell that the school isn't what it seems and a menacing darkness lurks around every corner.Can Sara gather the courage to survive the school... or will it swallow her whole before she even has a chance to try?
author: Richard Cardenas
